text: Cytokine Detection by ICS and ELISA

At day 5 or 7 , cells were restimulated with immobilized anti - <extra_id_0> CD3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( 2 mug / ml ) and anti - <extra_id_0> CD28 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( 2 mug / ml ) ( 4 hr with BrefeldinA [ 10 mug / ml ] in the last 2 hr ) or with PdBU and Ionomycin ( 5 hr with BrefeldinA [ 1 mug / ml ] ) .
After ICS FACS , data were collected on a FACSCalibur ( Becton Dickinson ) and analyzed with FlowJo ( Tree Star ) .

For ELISA , cells were similarly restimulated for 48 hr and supernatant was collected and analyzed for <extra_id_0> IL-4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , <extra_id_0> IL-10 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , and <extra_id_0> IFN-gamma <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> as described before ( Shoemaker etal . , 2006 ) .
